casebody.data:
99-0640 (La. 4/23/99)

Jessie J. LEDET v. Dina Marie LEIGHTON, et al. No. 99-C-0640. Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 23, 1999.

IN RE: Leighton, Dina Marie Et Al;— Defendant(s); Applying for Writ of Certio-rari and/or Review; to the Court of Appeal, Third Circuit, Number CA98-0952; Parish of Lafayette 15th Judicial District Court Div. “A” Number 94-1656

Denied.

CALOGERO, C.J. and KNOLL, J. would grant the writ. LEMMON, J. not on panel.
